overview: Kleio and Jessie Lee co-founded the "Better Blonde Business" agency to prove one simple fact to the world, BLONDES DO IT BETTER. Along with three of their hot blonde girlfriends (Krissie Dee,Nicole Malice, Eden Von Sleaze), these sexy entrepreneurs leave no cock untouched and every customer fully satisfied. When five hot blondes get together, they sure can do anything ...or anyone!
title: Blondes Do It Better
